name: Exam Helper
description:
This game was made for PitiIT Community Jam #1

Made by: Me and my friend Extereli

Every asset I used (names of creators are in links):

https://ghostdatamedia.itch.io/school-assets  (license: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) - furniture

https://emily2.itch.io/schoolgirl-sidescroller-sprite - teacher

https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/button-ui - UI buttons

https://elv-games.itch.io/free-fantasy-dreamland-sprites - students
